metadata.synopsis: One-liner for Bhaal cultist in the sewers. Reacts to whether or not you are allied with Orin.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Make sure you have an agreement with Orin (it is not currently implemented) and go to -25; 22; 806 and click on Night Blade - S_LOW_Bhaalist03 - abce7142-0fad-4801-8d34-4bfeffec23da

0.speaker: Night Blade Dogaletto
0.text: Bhaal shows us the way. We are but blades for the execution of his will.

1.speaker: Night Blade Dogaletto
1.text: It takes a sharp weapon to kill, but a sharper mind to make a slaughter fit for Bhaal. I am pleased that you have both.

2.speaker: Night Blade Dogaletto
2.text: What you must have done to win Bhaal's blessings from Lady Orin... I quiver to think of such violence.

3.speaker: Night Blade Dogaletto
3.text: This was your final blunder. Bhaal bays for your blood.
